product_name: The North Face Torpedo Stretch Pants - Men's
long_description: Stretchy, lightweight, and wind- and water-resistant, The North Face Torpedo pants cut through the chilly weather to keep you comfortable during training runs. Lightweight polyester and elastane shell with a Durable Water Repellent finish shields against light rain. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zippered pockets stash workout essentials. Calf zippers offer easy dressing over footwear. Reflective logos on The North Face Torpedo Stretch pants boost your visibility in dim light.
short_description: Stretchy, lightweight, and wind- and water-resistant, The North Face Torpedo pants cut through the chilly weather to keep you comfortable during training runs.
